title: [Large-Scale] Mathematics Problem-Solving Improvement Course Utilizing Context-Based Dynamic Learning Resource Allocation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational math concepts and experience applying them to tasks
context.additional_context: Practical math education for working professionals, with personalized situational learning support using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mathematical problems occurring in real work situations with 85% accuracy.
Learners can improve their learning goal achievement rate by 70% or more using a dynamic resource allocation system tailored to situational contexts.
Learners can demonstrate the process of solving complex work scenarios mathematically through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
